statements: SELECT * FROM financial_products_performance;
SELECT product_name, product_type FROM financial_products_performance WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM financial_products_performance;
SELECT product_name FROM financial_products_performance WHERE product_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(product_id), MIN(product_id) FROM financial_products_performance;
SELECT * FROM financial_products_performance WHERE product_type = 'Stocks'
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM financial_products_performance WHERE product_type = 'Mutual Funds'
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_data->'total_return' AS total_return FROM financial_products_performance ORDER BY total_return DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_products_performance WHERE performance_data->'risk_level' = 'High' AND performance_data->'volatility' > 0.05
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_data->'yearly_performance' AS yearly_performance FROM financial_products_performance WHERE product_type = 'Bonds' ORDER BY yearly_performance ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_return FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_date, performance_return FROM historical_performance_data ORDER BY performance_return DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_return FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_return > 5.0;
SELECT product_name, performance_date FROM historical_performance_data WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, performance_return FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_return > 5.0 ORDER BY performance_return DESC;
SELECT product_name, performance_date FROM historical_performance_data WHERE product_id = 1 AND performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, AVG(performance_return) AS avg_return FROM historical_performance_data GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(performance_return) > 8.0 ORDER BY avg_return DESC;
SELECT f.product_name, f.product_type, h.performance_date FROM financial_products f INNER JOIN historical_performance_data h ON f.product_id = h.product_id WHERE h.performance_return < 0;
SELECT * FROM historical_performance;
SELECT product_name, performance_date, performance_value FROM historical_performance ORDER BY performance_value DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, performance_date FROM historical_performance WHERE performance_value > 100;
SELECT product_name, product_type, issuer FROM financial_products WHERE inception_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT evaluation_date, comparison_result FROM comparison_evaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, performance_value, performance_date FROM historical_performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_products WHERE inception_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT product_name, performance_value FROM historical_performance WHERE performance_value > 1000 ORDER BY performance_value DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.comparison_result FROM financial_products p JOIN comparison_evaluation c ON p.product_id = c.product1_id;

SELECT fp.product_name AS product, cp.comparison_result AS result FROM financial_products fp JOIN comparison_evaluation ce ON fp.product_id = ce.product1_id JOIN comparison_evaluation cp ON fp.product_id = cp.product2_id WHERE ce.evaluation_date = '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_type FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, performance FROM products ORDER BY performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_type = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, start_date, end_date FROM products WHERE performance > 1000 ORDER BY performance DESC;

SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id WHERE products.performance < 500 ORDER BY products.start_date ASC, categories.category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY performance DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT id, name, category FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name FROM Product WHERE id = 3;
SELECT description FROM Product WHERE name LIKE '%Phone%';
SELECT * FROM FinancialAdviser WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, description FROM Product WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Performance WHERE value > 100.00 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(value) as avg_value FROM Performance GROUP BY product_id HAVING avg_value > 50.00;
SELECT p.name as product_name, c.name as client_name FROM Product p INNER JOIN Client c ON p.id = c.id;
